001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003import java.util.regex.Pattern;
004
005/**
006 * Utility class used to manipulate text in order to aid any TextFilter
007 * implementation in its job if needed.
008 * 
009 * @see org.relationlearn.filters.TextFilter
010 */
011public class TextUtils {
012    
013    private static final Pattern DELIMITERS = Pattern.compile("\\W");
014    
015    private TextUtils() {}
016    
017    /**
018     * Splits a unique String containing a text into and array of Strings
019     * that contain words, punctuation marks, and special characters separated.
020     * 
021     * @param text the original text to split
022     * @return the input text splitted in an more easy to manipulate way for
023     * TextFilter implementations
024     * 
025     * @see org.relationlearn.filters.TextFilter
026     */
027    public static String[] getWordsFromText(String text) {
028        return DELIMITERS.split(text);
029    }
030
031}
